name: Sunny Side Up
description:
Ludum Dare 34 game - made in 4 hours

CONTROLS: A, D ... and growing

press buttons on rainy clouds, avoid storm clouds

there is no win/lose condition or endgame, just have fun and try to manage as many flower as you can.

whenever a flower dies, 2 new flowers are spawned. after 50 taps, new flower is spawned.

[ Sunny Side Up on Ludum Dare ]
